page.title: 11ELDERLY VIEW_LITTLE MILL
page.content: Being an elderly resident of the village,I have to rely on relatives and friends for their help.I live alone in a large house and can only go out with someone's help.I need assistance to go shopping,to visit the doctor's surgery or hospital as there is a limited bus service. A lady homehelp comes once a week to help with household chores.Every fortnight a window cleaner calls to clean the outside windows.A hairdresser calls whenever I ask.I love my garden but my arthritis restricts what I can do so two good friends keep it neat and tidy for me. Friends help me to walk the short distance to the village hall so I can enjoy W.I. meetings,bingo and whist drives.I value everyones' help, without them I would be very lonely.
